name: magic I4 engine
description: A magically manifested combustion engine.  Despite operating entirely off of mana rather than normal fuel, it otherwise functions exactly as a conventional 1600 cc 4 cylinder combustion engine.

name: magic V6 engine
description: A magically manifested combustion engine.  Despite operating entirely off of mana rather than normal fuel, it otherwise functions exactly as a conventional 2800 cc 6 cylinder combustion engine.
A pair of oars for a boat.  Being powered by magic, they paddle on their own.

A magically manifested combustion engine.  Despite operating entirely off of mana rather than fuel, it otherwise functions exactly as a cenventional high-compression, 200 cc single-cylinder 4-stroke combustion engine.
